ComicInfo.Title: Homefront, Part 1 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: YO JOE! The truth is out: the world knows the G.I. JOE team is real. Now Duke leads his squad directly into the public eye, confronting COBRA on American soil! The best of the best just got better, as Fred Van Lente and Steve Kurth lead the charge and we roll out one new G.I. Joe title a month for the next three months!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 15:04:13. [CVDB387279]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allen Martinez, Art Adams, Jamal Igle, Joana Lafuente, Juan Doe, Romulo Fajardo Jr., Ryan Dunlavey, Steve Kurth
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Cover Girl, Doc, Doc, Duke, General Colton, Hashtag, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Shipwreck, Tunnel Rat, W.O.R.M.S., Windmill
ComicInfo.Locations: Fort Jay, New York State, Ohio
